author: James Anderson, business development manager, Actalent
description:
It’s 2025 and the U.S. is awash in semiconductor manufacturing investments, from TSMC’s landmark $100 billion, five-facility plan announced in March to GlobalWafers’ recent $4 billion capital infusion. As more global chip giants set their sights on American capabilities, U.S. semiconductor manufacturing capacity is poised to triple from 2022 to 2032. But there’s a big […]

The post Does the Semiconductor Industry Have a Perception Problem? appeared first on EE Times.
title: Does the Semiconductor Industry Have a Perception Problem?

author: Sally Ward-Foxton
description:
At EE Times’ chiplet event, Arm’s Eddie Ramirez warned that today’s semi-custom chiplets are limiting the TCO benefits of the technology

The post Arm: Chiplets Can’t Deliver on TCO Without an Ecosystem appeared first on EE Times.
title: Arm: Chiplets Can’t Deliver on TCO Without an Ecosystem
